formErrorPredefineMappingParameterIssue: A required parameter was not set. Please check the form and make sure that all required values are set. This includes referenced attributes.
formErrorPredefineMappingBadReference: A referenced entry does not exist. Please check the form to ensure all references are valid. This includes referenced attributes, projects, trials and container types.
formErrorPredefineMappingDuplicateBarcod: A specified barcode already exists in the database. Make sure to only specify barcodes that don't already exist.
formErrorPredefineMappingBarcodeOrDescri: A specified barcode or description is too long. Barcodes are limited to 100 characters and descriptions to 255 characters.
formErrorPredefineMappingAttributeValueW: A specified attribute value is of the wrong data type. Please ensure to only provider numbers for numeric attributes  (no 'N/A', '-' or similar) and dates in the format 'YYYY-MM-DD' (e.g. '2022-12-31').
formDescriptionContainerBarcode: Scan or enter the barcode of a container.
formDescriptionImportItem: Scan or enter the barcode of an existing item or a new entry.
formDescriptionImportInto: Scan or enter the barcode that identifies the container you want to import elements into.
formDescriptionImportContainerType: Select the type of the containers that will be imported.
formDescriptionImportProject: The project this item will be part of.
formDescriptionImportTrial: The trial this item will be part of.
formDescriptionTransferFrom: The container you want to transfer items out of.
formDescriptionTransferTo: The container you want to transfer items into.
formDescriptionPredefinePaste: Paste your data in tabular form from sources like Excel.
formPlaceholderPredefinePaste:
barcode	description	row	column
ABC-123				1	1
ABC-234	Prisma		1	2
ABC-345	Optic		1	3
formPlaceholderAddContainerTypesIcon: Paste SVG code here or select .svg file using the selector below.
modalTextImportConfirmTransfer: Some items you have scanned are already part of another container. Please confirm if you want to move them.
modalTextClearContainerConfirm: Are you sure you want to remove all items from this container? They will be marked as inactive and will no longer be part of this container.
pageHomeCardImportSubtitle: Add new entries into the system or move them around.
pageHomeCardSearchSubtitle: Search for any container to quickly see information about it.
pageHomeCardPredefineSubtitle: Prepare containers before they get scanned/entered into the system.
pageHomeWelcome: Welcome to STASH - The stock management system.
pageHomeInstructions: Start by selecting one of the operations below.
pageImportText: This page is used to add new containers to the system or to move them to another container. This usually involves selecting the container they should go into along with the project. While you're scanning containers, they will be checked against the database. If they don't exist, you will have to confirm their creation before they can be imported.
pageImportContainerTableText: Use this section to scan or enter the items you want to import into the container you selected above.
pagePredefineText: On this page you can predefine containers before they are entered into the system. This will make it faster when you're actually scanning them in at a later date.
pagePredefineMappingText: Please select a mapping for columns in your input. Please ensure the following conditions are met:
pagePredefineMappingConditionMappingDupl: No two columns are mapped to the same thing.
pagePredefineMappingConditionAttributesM: All attribute mappings have a target attribute selected.
pageTransferText: On this page you can transfer all items from one container to another container of the same type.
pageTransferErrorSameContainer: Same container selected as source and target.
pageTransferErrorContainerNotFound: A referenced container has not been found. Please check you scanned/entered the correct barcode.
pageTransferResultText: No container has been transferred. | One container has been transferred. | {count} containers have been transferred.
toastErrorMissingParameter: A required parameter is missing. Please check the form.
toastErrorIncompatibleContainerTypes: The two specified containers have incompatible types.
toastMessageContainersAdded: No containers added. | One container added. | {count} containers added.
ttsNotificationIncompatibleContainerType: The container you scanned has a different container type to what has been specified.
ttsNotificationDuplicateContainer: The container you scanned is a duplicate and has been added before.
widgetContainerNoMatchSubtitle: The barcode you provided has not been found in the database. Please make sure to import containers before searching here.
